backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing prewritten summaries of key frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling level progression, transitions, and global UI like background and header.
frontend/src/components/quiz/levels/Comp: Final slide showing a congratulatory message and themed visuals after level completion.
frontend/src/components/quiz/levels/Intr: Intro slide with animated hearts, description text, and a Start button to begin the quiz.
frontend/src/components/quiz/levels/Leve: Multiple-choice quiz level that checks a correct answer, triggers success animation, and calls onCorrect or onWrong.
Similar multiple-choice level validating a specific correct option and showing success feedback before advancing.
Simple choice-based level that immediately triggers onCorrect after an option is selected.
Multiple-choice level with a defined correct answer and success overlay, calling onCorrect or onWrong.
Free‑text input level that completes only when the user submits a non‑empty response.
frontend/src/components/quiz/ProgressInd: Displays numbered circles and heart icons showing the user’s quiz progress.
frontend/src/components/quiz/QuizSlide.t: Generic slide wrapper with a card layout, progress indicator, and responsive title.
frontend/src/components/quiz/SlideTransi: Simple opacity-based fade transition wrapper for slide animations.
frontend/src/components/quiz/SuccessFeed: Full‑screen animated heart and sparkle burst shown on correct answers.
frontend/src/components/quiz/WrongAnswer: Top-of-screen dismissible toast notifying the user of a wrong answer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuzzFeedback.ts: Provides wrong‑answer feedback state and optional buzz sound playback with safe audio initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing login, logout, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for frontend‑only use.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and dark‑mode palette definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, container settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for a 5-level Valentine-themed quiz website, including features, known UI and deployment issues, and version metadata.
